snippet: A federal judge on Wednesday struck down a state law barring sale of foie gras, ending a ban of the fatty duck liver that had lasted more than two years.
abstract: Federal judge strikes down California law forbidding sale of foie gras, ending ban of fatty duck liver that had existed over two years.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge on Wednesday struck down a state law barring sale of foie gras, ending a ban of the fatty duck liver that had lasted more than two years.

headline.main: California: Ban on Foie Gras Is Ended
headline.print_headline: California: Ban on Foie Gras Is Ended

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals
